text: Lalle ne haƙĩƙa waɗanda suka ce: "Lalle ne Allah, shĩne Masĩhu, ɗan Maryama," sun kãfirta. Alhãli kuwa Masĩhu yã ce: "Yã Banĩ Isrã'ĩla! Ku bauta wa Allah Ubangijina, kuma Ubangijinku." Lalle ne shĩ, wanda ya yi shirki da Allah, to, lalle ne, Allah Yã haramta masa Aljanna. Kuma bãbu wasu mataimaka ga azzãlumai
